BioNERO 0.1.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

Reference

All functions

PC_correction()

Apply Principal Component (PC)-based correction for confounding artifacts in coexpression networks

SFT_fit()

Pick power to fit network to a scale-free topology

ZKfiltering()

Filter outlying samples based on standardized connectivity (Zk) method

cel2RMA()

Create an RMA-normalized expression data frame from .cel files

consensus_modules()

Identify consensus modules across multiple data sets

consensus_set_relationship()

Relate consensus modules to set-specific modules

consensusmodules_sample_cor()

Correlate set-specific modules and consensus modules to sample information

detect_communities()

Detect communities in a network

dfs2one()

Combine multiple expression tables (.tsv) into a single data frame

enrichment_analysis()

Perform enrichment analysis for a set of genes

exp2net()

Reconstruct gene coexpression network from gene expression data frame

exp_preprocess()

Preprocess expression data for network reconstruction

filter_by_variance()

Filter expression data frame to keep only the most varying genes

filter_edges()

Filter edge list to remove spurious correlations

gene_significance()

Calculate gene significance for a given group of genes

get_HK()

Get a vector object with housekeeping genes

get_edge_list()

Get edge list from an adjacency matrix for a group of genes

get_homologs()

Get homologous genes of given gene or gene set

get_hubs()

Get hub genes in a given module or in all modules at once

get_neighbors()

Get 1st-order neighbors of a given gene or group of genes

igraph2ggnetwork()

Create a ggnetwork data frame from an igraph object

is_duplicated()

Boolean expression to check if gene or gene set is duplicated in the genome or not

is_singleton()

Boolean expression to check if gene or gene set is singleton or not

module_preservation()

Calculate module preservation between two expression data sets

module_stability()

Perform module stability analysis

module_trait_cor()

Correlate module eigengenes to trait

net_stats()

Calculate network statistics

plot_PCA()

Plot Principal Component Analysis (PCA) of samples

plot_expression_profile()

Plot expression profile of given genes across samples

plot_gcn()

Plot gene coexpression network from edge list

plot_grn()

Plot gene regulatory network from edge list

plot_heatmap()

Plot heatmap of hierarchically clustered sample correlations or gene expression

plot_ngenes_per_module()

Plot number of genes per module

plot_ppi()

Plot protein-protein interaction network from edge list

probe2gene()

Collapse probe-level expression matrix (or data frame) to gene-level

q_normalize()

Quantile normalize the expression data

remove_na()

Remove missing values in a gene expression data frame

remove_nonexp()

Remove genes that are not expressed based on a user-defined threshold

Contents

Developed by Fabricio Almeida-Silva.
